short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DynamoDB Record Remover - designed to automate the deletion of records from DynamoDB tables, page by page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DynamoDB Record Remover is a specialized Chrome extension designed to automate the deletion of records from DynamoDB tables, page by page. This tool simplifies the manual process of clearing out records. When a filter is applied, the automation will respect the filter criteria, ensuring that only the filtered records are deleted, rather than clearing the entire database.
